# passwork_folder (Resource)

Folder resource



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the folder
- `vault_id` (String) Vault ID of the folder

### Optional

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) ID of the folder
